WorkItem.Description: See /Tests/08conditionalformatting.php for a demonstration of this problem. The conditional formatting is applied correctly to cell B2; but using duplicateStyle to copy it to B3:B7, no conditional styling is applied to any of cells B3 to B7
WorkItem.Summary: duplicateStyle() method doesn't duplicate conditional formats

Comments.Message: As a quick fix for the duplicateStyle() bug with conditional styles, I've added a duplicateConditionalStyle() method to the PHPExcel worksheet class; which works similarly to duplicateStyle() but accepts an array of conditional style classes instead of a single style class.
